sentences.en: Also as a way of respect for Chieftain Mu.
sentences.cn: 同样是为了尊重木氏土司.

sentences.en: I only want to talk with your chieftain.
sentences.cn: 我只跟你们的首领谈话.

sentences.en: Shaman and Chieftain now found in Nomad encounters.
sentences.cn: 在大地图也可以遇到僧人和酋长了?

sentences.en: Tauren Chieftain ; Shockwave is now capped at 8 units of full damage ( down from 12 )
sentences.cn: 牛头人:冲击波最多伤害8个单位. ( 原来是12个 )

sentences.en: Tauren Chieftain ; Starting Strength and Intelligence increased by 1.
sentences.cn: 牛 头人 :初始力量与智力+1.

sentences.en: Tauren Chieftain base Intelligence increased to 15 from 14.
sentences.cn: 意思是:牛头人酋长智力底线从14减少到15.你们怎么说反了呀?

sentences.en: The chieftain had a herald who announced his arrival with a trumpet.
sentences.cn: 酋长的传令官用喇叭宣布酋长的莅临.

sentences.en: The enemy chieftain was opposed and deserted by his followers.
The ill - doings of the fascist chieftain redounded upon himself.
sentences.cn: 法西斯头子干的种种坏事使他自食其果.

sentences.en: There he met the famous Shoshone chieftain Washakie.
sentences.cn: 在那里他碰到了著名的绍山酋长华谢基.

sentences.en: There is a tremendous difference in strategy between playing Deity and Chieftain.
sentences.cn: 在神级和酋长级难度下存在着巨大的差异.

sentences.en: Tribes break apart when their chieftain is eventually defeated or killed.
sentences.cn: 当酋长最终被击败或杀死时,部落就会土崩瓦解.

sentences.en: Warsong Orc: Chieftain, re under attack!
sentences.cn: 战歌部落兽人: 族长, 我们受到攻击!

sentences.en: Who would you choose your chieftain?

words.tran_cn: 酋长或首领的地位或职位

trans.tran_en: the leader of a tribe or a Scottish  clan
